synopsis.text: When a cryptic package arrives for Tomoe, Nanami's world is turned upside down, as she grapples with feelings of self-doubt and insignificance. In an attempt to uncover the truth about the mysterious box, she embarks on a mission to prove her worth to Tomoe. In the second part of this two-episode OVA, Nanami joins Tomoe for a day at the hot springs, where she is determined to showcase her independence and capabilities. Along the way, they encounter familiar faces and embark on a journey to find a legendary stone that promises eternal happiness to couples who touch it together. Will Nanami be able to prove her worth and rekindle the spark with Tomoe, or will the secrets of the mysterious box drive them apart forever? Join Nanami and Tomoe in this heartwarming and emotional adventure that explores the complexities of love and relationships.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
